name: Access Denied (itch) (Matt Mader)
description:
Access Denied is a game designed for developers, this infiltration game is meant to give developers an experience of what it is like to play a game with a disability. Games can only be as accessible as they are designed to be.  

One really cannot experience a disability in their daily life, but through our          simulation of colorblindness; players can get a look into the daily experience of someone else’s world.  

Through this title, we hope to influence other developers to consider how their   actions and choices during development may affect their players.
